text: "DJ Got Us Fallin' in Love" is a song by American singer Usher. It features rapper Pitbull. It was written by Savan Kotecha, Pitbull, Shellback and Max Martin. While Martin produced the song. It was released as the first single from Versus (2010). It was released as a digital download on July 13, 2010. ==Tracklist== ;Digital Download # "DJ Got Us Fallin' in Love" (feat.
